name: State Medicaid Fraud Control Units
objective: To investigate and prosecute Medicaid provider fraud as well as patient abuse or neglect in health facilities and board and care facilities and of Medicaid beneficiaries in non-institutional or other settings.
top_agency_name: Department of Health and Human Services
sub_agency_name: Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services

authorizations.text: XIX, 1902(a)(61), Social Security Act (The Act), as amended.

rules_regulations: 42 CFR 1007, 45 CFR 75, and Performance Standards originally issued September 1994 and revised in June 2012.
